          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Breakdown of rubber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenbruch des Gummis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Panne du caoutchouc</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Avaria da borracha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ripartizione di gomma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διακοπή του λάστιχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ruptura del caucho</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the breakdown of rubber upon addition of ozone to produce carbonyl groups.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">breakdown</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbonyl groups</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ozone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rubber</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Zusammenbruch des 
Gummis nach Hinzufügung des Ozons zu den Erzeugniskarbonylgruppen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre la panne du 
caoutchouc sur l'ajout de l'ozone aux groupes carbonyliques de 
produit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra a avaria da borracha 
em cima da adição do ozônio aos grupos de carbonyl do produto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra la ripartizione di 
gomma sull'aggiunta di ozono ai gruppi carbonilici dei prodotti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει τη διακοπή του 
λάστιχου επάνω στην προσθήκη του όζοντος για να παραγάγει τις 
ομάδες καρβονυλίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra la ruptura del caucho
sobre la adición del ozono a los grupos de carbonyl del producto.</string>
          </description>
